# Zen Analytics: Unified Analytics & Ad Tracker Inspector

> Zen Analytics is a unified Chrome extension that simplifies digital analytics debugging by aggregating data from over 20+ trackers (including Google Analytics 4, Meta Pixel, TikTok, and GTM) into a single interface. It provides real-time validation, session recording, and advanced debugging tools.

## Core Resources

- [Homepage](https://zap-pixel.web.app/): Official landing page and overview.
- [Install Extension](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/zen-analytics-pixel-track/gknigcbhlammoakmmdddkblknanpjiac): Direct link to install from Chrome Web Store.

## Critical Information

- **Status**: BETA (Free Premium Access). All premium features are currently free to try.
- **Access**: Trigger via `CTRL + Shift + Space` (Popup), DevTools (F12), SidePanel, or In-Page View.

## Key Capabilities

- **Unified Analytics Debugger**: Monitor GA4, Google Ads, Meta, TikTok, and 20+ other platforms simultaneously. Includes a dedicated GTM debugger with dataLayer viewer.
- **Session Capture & Recording**: Record your entire browsing session and export findings for analysis.
- **In-Page Live Tracking**: View pixel firing events in real-time via an unobtrusive injected iframe directly on the website.
- **Google Consent Mode Inspector**: Validate consent state and behavior.
- **Structured Tag Assistant**: View tracker attributes organized logically for easy debugging.
- **Multi-View Support**: Access data via Popup, SidePanel, DevTools, or In-Page overlay.

## Supported Platforms (Partial List)

- Google Analytics 4 (GA4)
- Google Tag Manager (GTM)
- Meta (Facebook) Ads
- TikTok Ads
- Microsoft (Bing) Ads
- Mixpanel
- LinkedIn Insight Tag
- Pinterest Pixel
- Snap Pixel
- Taboola
- Outbrain
- And 10+ others
